text: John Heard, an actor perhaps best known for his roles in Home Alone and on The Sopranos, died Friday at age 72. Shortly after receiving the news of his death, actors and other artists began sharing tributes to the late actor via social media. Elijah Wood, who appeared with Heard in 1992 ’ s Radio Flyer, tweeted, “ Sad to hear of John Heard ’ s passing. ” “ What a wonderful actor, ” Jeff Bridges wrote. “ We were in the movie Cutter ’ s Way together & I got to experience his artistry and dedication first hand.
